DESCRIPTION: An alchemical ingredient. Combining 2 Reagents with Mix can be used to produce a variety of effects.
Consume your 2 topmost stockpiled Reagents to produce an effect. Only works when at least 2 Reagents are stockpiled.
Imbalanced creatures take 50% more damage from Mix effects.
Expend your topmost Reagent by flinging it at a random enemy, inflicting 4 damage.
Targeted creatures will always be hit by Flung Reagents. Only one enemy can be afflicted with Targeted at a time.
